require(htmltools)

}
econWeb::Dependency() -> dep

  tagList(
    dep$jquery$onCloud(),
    dep$materialise$onCloud(),
    # reactR::html_dependency_react(),
    htmltools::includeScript(
      "inst/app/js/formProcessing.js"
    )
  ) |>
  attachAppDependencies() |>
  app$update()
